bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yan xi 眼瘜 , tumor-illness on the eye, with a crystal clear color reminiscent of pearls in a tube. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 28, Mu bing zhu hou 目病諸候 lists 目珠管候 , “Signs of pearls in a tube in the eye”: 血氣蘊積，衝發於眼，津液變生結聚， 狀如珠管 , “Blood and qi collect massively, and rush against and effuse in the eye. The liquid transforms into nodular collections shaped like pearls in a tube ”. After its first appearance in the Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 , the term zhu guan 珠管 was quoted in Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 , Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 , Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 , Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 , and Pu ji fang 普濟方 , albeit never with an explanatory remark permitting its identification from hindsight. Beginning with the Ming era, no ophthalmological work mentioned it again.
